Sentencas: Post-reforming experimental results for the complete removal of light hydrocarbons from diesel reformate are introduced in part I.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In part II of the paper, an integrated diesel fuel processor is investigated for the stable operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Several post-reforming processors have been operated to suppress both sulfur poisoning and carbon deposition on the anode catalyst.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The integrated diesel fuel processor is composed of an autothermal reformer, a desulfurizer, and a post-reformer.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The autothermal reforming section in the integrated diesel fuel processor effectively decomposes aromatics, and converts fuel into H-2-rich syngas.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The subsequent desulfurizer removes sulfur-containing compounds present in the diesel reformate.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the post-reformer completely removes the light hydrocarbons, which are carbon precursors, in the diesel reformate.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We successfully operate the diesel reformer, desulfurizer, and post-reformer as microreactors for about 2500 h in an integrated mode.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The degradation rate of the overall reforming performance is negligible for the 2000 h, and light hydrocarbons and sulfur-containing compounds are completely removed from the diesel reformate.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: II. Integrated diesel fuel processor for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells
